name: Hentai Puzzle Classic
description:
Hentai Puzzle Classic - this is a new erotic puzzle-game in which you will need to solve different pictures.
In this game there will be 10 different levels and chill and relaxing music.Editor mode
  • With this mode, you can upload your photos to solve the puzzle from it! And you can change the number of cells!
Achievements
  • We have prepared new and interesting achievements for you!
Photo gallery
  • As you progress through the levels, you can open the photo gallery to see your solved girls!
